name: ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialRegistrationRequest
desc: The object for registering a new security key credential.

items.name: var credentialParameters: [ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialParameters]
items.desc: An array of parameters for the credential.

items.name: var excludedCredentials: [ASAuthorizationSecurityKeyPublicKeyCredentialDescriptor]
items.desc: An array of excluded parameters for the credential.

items.name: var residentKeyPreference: ASAuthorizationPublicKeyCredentialResidentKeyPreference
items.desc: The preference that indicates where the resident key resides.
